Package com.google.code.ssm.config


Interface Summary
AddressChangeListener Changes addresses of cache servers.
AddressChangeNotifier Notifies associated AddressChangeListener about changes of servers' addresses.
AddressProvider Provides addresses of cache servers.
 

Class Summary
DefaultAddressProvider  
JndiAddressProvider Gets servers' addresses from JNDI defined under key JndiAddressProvider#getJndiKey().
